document.full_text: a u.s. army judge on friday ordered one of five soldiers charged with murdering unarmed afghan civilians to be released from jail and placed under home confinement while he awaits his court-martial.
document.title: soldier in afghan murder case sent to home confinement
lines_and_colors: a u.s. army judge on friday ordered one of five soldiers charged with murdering unarmed afghan civilians to be released from jail and placed under home confinement while he awaits his court-martial.
